subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Woody Austin’s goal was to make the Ryder Cup team, and after his second straight 79 in the P.G.A. Championship, he was convinced he had failed to reach it.
snippet: Woody Austin’s goal was to make the Ryder Cup team, and after his second straight 79 in the P.G.A. Championship, he was convinced he had failed to reach it.
